front.title: Use Cases for DDoS Open Threat Signaling (DOTS) Telemetry

abstract.t: DOTS Telemetry enriches base DOTS protocol to assist the mitigator to perform efficient DDoS attack mitigation techniques in the network. This document presents sample use cases for DOTS telemetry: what componets are deployed in the network, how they collaborate, and what information are exchanged to perform the techniques.
